column4: is there any way to see if an audio interface is sending audio? I have a PCTV card which seems to be working properly, but there is no audio.
u can use pavucontrol to check your audio playback stream(s) if you're using pulseaudio
thanks alot! It seems that the audio interface _is_ making some noise, which would suggest that I may not have connected it properly.
mighty handy app indeed ... you're welcome
